Overview

Client is the class for executing GraphQL requests against a Service Catalog API.

Defined Under Namespace

Modules: GraphqlQuerySemantics, Groups, Owners, Scorecards, Services, Slos, TaskLocks Classes: Error, GroupsQueryBinder, OwnersQueryBinder, QueryBinder, Response, ScorecardsQueryBinder, ServicesQueryBinder, SlosQueryBinder, TaskLocksQueryBinder

Constant Summary collapse

DEFAULT_SLEEP_BETWEEN_RETRIES =

Seconds for the process to sleep between retries after encountering an error.

1
DEFAULT_ERROR_CLASSES_TO_RETRY =

List of Ruby error classes to retry by default.

Returns:

  • (Array) —

    default list of exceptions to rescue

[
  EOFError,
  SocketError,
  Net::OpenTimeout,              # Couldn't open a connection.
  Net::ReadTimeout,              # Timed out reading a response.
  Net::HTTPFatalError,           # The Error class for HTTP errors
  Net::HTTPRequestTimeOut,       # 408
  Net::HTTPInternalServerError,  # 500
  Net::HTTPBadGateway,           # 502
  Net::HTTPServiceUnavailable,   # 503
  Net::HTTPGatewayTimeOut,       # 504
].freeze

Current gem version.

Returns:

  • (String) —

    Current gem version in SemVer notation.

"0.5.0"

    Further options with symbol keys (sleep_duration can be set this way)

# File 'lib/service-catalog/client.rb', line 57

def initialize(endpoint:, token:, options: {})
  @endpoint = endpoint
  @token = token
  @uri = URI.parse(endpoint)
  @options = options
  @sleep_duration = options[:sleep_duration] || DEFAULT_SLEEP_BETWEEN_RETRIES
end

# File 'lib/service-catalog/client.rb', line 82

def connection
  Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port).tap do |client|
    client.use_ssl = uri.scheme == "https"
    client.open_timeout = options[:open_timeout] || 5
    client.read_timeout = options[:read_timeout] || 5
    client.write_timeout = options[:write_timeout] || 5
  end
end

#headers(context = {}) ⇒ Hash

    (optional) list of additional headers to add

  • (Hash) —

    HTTP headers

# File 'lib/service-catalog/client.rb', line 70

def headers(context = {})
  default_headers = {
    "User-Agent"    => "service-catalog-client/#{ServiceCatalog::Client::VERSION}",
    "Authorization" => "Bearer #{token}",
  }
  default_headers.merge!(context[:headers] || {}) if context
  default_headers
end

#query(query:, variables: {}, context: {}) ⇒ Hash

    (optional) Variables for GraphQL query

    GraphQL response, along with HTTP response as “raw_response” key

# File 'lib/service-catalog/client.rb', line 98

def query(query:, variables: {}, context: {})
  request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)

  request.basic_auth(uri.user, uri.password) if uri.user || uri.password

  request["Accept"] = "application/json"
  request["Content-Type"] = "application/json"
  headers(context).each { |name, value| request[name] = value }

  body = {}
  body["query"] = query.to_s
  body["variables"] = variables if variables.any?
  request.body = JSON.generate(body)

  response = nil
  ActiveSupport::Notifications.instrument("service_catalog_client.query", body) do
    response = connection.request(request)
  end
  response_data = case response
  when Net::HTTPOK, Net::HTTPBadRequest
    JSON.parse(response.body)
  else
    { "errors" => [{ "message" => "#{response.code} #{response.message}" }] }
  end

  response_data["raw_response"] = response

  response_data
end

#query_with_retries(query:, variables: {}, context: {}, max_retries: 3, retriable_error_classes: DEFAULT_ERROR_CLASSES_TO_RETRY) ⇒ Hash

Run a query and retry on non-success responses.

Parameters:

  • query (String) —

    GraphQL query

  • variables (Hash) (defaults to: {}) —

    (optional) Variables for GraphQL query

  • context (Hash) (defaults to: {}) —

    (optional) Additional headers

  • max_retries (Integer) (defaults to: 3) —

    (optional) Maximum number of times to retry this query if it fails

  • retriable_error_classes (Array<Exception>) (defaults to: DEFAULT_ERROR_CLASSES_TO_RETRY) —

    (optional) Acceptable error classes to retry from.

Returns:

  • (Hash) —

    GraphQL response, along with HTTP response as “raw_response” key



137

# File 'lib/service-catalog/client.rb', line 137

def query_with_retries(query:, variables: {}, context: {}, max_retries: 3, retriable_error_classes: DEFAULT_ERROR_CLASSES_TO_RETRY)
  retries_left ||= max_retries
  response_data = query(query: query, variables: variables, context: context)
  case response_data["raw_response"]
  when Net::HTTPOK, Net::HTTPBadRequest
    return response_data
  else
    raise response_data["raw_response"].error_type.new(
      "#{response_data["raw_response"].class} #{response_data["raw_response"].body}",
      response_data["raw_response"]
    )
  end
rescue *retriable_error_classes
  raise unless retries_left > 0
  retries_left -= 1
  sleep sleep_duration
  retry
end
